tasks.title: Combine Volume Profile with VWAP for NQ
tasks.description: Test combining Volume Profile with VWAP as entry filter on NQ. Document hypothesis first. Run backtest with costs. Save results showing improvement vs single indicator to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Run full backtest for trend following
tasks.description: Backtest trend following strategy on YM with: $2.50/side commission, 0.5 tick slippage, minimum 100 trades. Calculate Sharpe, max DD, win rate. Auto-reject if Sharpe>3.0 or win rate>80%. Save JSON results to output/backtests/2026-01-18/.

tasks.title: Test OOS performance of momentum
